name: Secret Santa Minigames 2021
description:
Happy Holidays Everyone! Dear Spacespy,  I hope you have a wonderful holiday season! I also like Warioware games and decided to make a (short) minigame compilation for you.  I took inspiration from your own game "Spookware - At the Hospital" and  wanted to challenge myself to make something as fun and goofy!  It kicked my butt, lol. But I hope you enjoy! - Heiden

This is a minigame compilation that I made for Spacespy (go check their work out!) as part of the Secret Santa 2021 jam! I learned so much from making this game and am super excited to use what I learned in future games~! :D 

Hope 2021 treated you kindly (at the very least, we made it this far!!;;) and excited to keep making things in the upcoming year. See you then! <3

Credits -
  • SFX by Zapsplat
  • Keyboard icon by Darius Dan
  • Literally everything else - It was me, Heiden! >:Dc
